mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (oseq, id, name, zip_num, address, phone, memo) VALUES(#{oseq},#{id},#{name},#{zip_num},#{address},#{phone}, #{memo})
INSERT INTO order_detail (odseq, oseq, pseq, quantity) VALUES(order_detail_seq.nextval,#{oseq},#{pseq},#{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT oseq FROM order_view WHERE id=#{id} AND result='1' ORDER BY oseq DESC
SELECT DISTINCT oseq FROM order_view WHERE id=#{id} AND result='2' ORDER BY oseq DESC
